snippet: Human Rights Watch said it had documented dozens of locations in Syria where cluster bombs, a widely prohibited munition, had been fired in the past year.
abstract: Human Rights Watch issues report saying it has documented dozens of locations in Syria where government forces have used cluster bombs, a widely prohibited munition, in country's civil war.
lead_paragraph: Human Rights Watch said it had documented dozens of locations in Syria where cluster bombs, a widely prohibited munition, had been fired in the past year.

headline.main: Report Says Syrian Forces Have Used Cluster Bombs
headline.print_headline: Report Says Syrian Forces Have Used Cluster Bombs

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
